code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[category,setCategory]=useState('');const[sortBy,setSortBy]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{let url='http://localhost:5000/api/products';const params=[];if(category)params.push("category=".concat(category));if(sortBy)params.push("sortBy=".concat(sortBy));if(params.length)url+='?'+params.join('&');fetch(url).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setProducts(data));},[category,sortBy]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{color:"red",textAlign:"center"},children:"\uD83D\uDED2 Product Listing"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{onChange:e=>setCategory(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"All Categories"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Electronics",children:"Electronics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Clothing",children:"Clothing"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Footwear",children:"Footwear"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Furniture",children:"Furniture"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{onChange:e=>setSortBy(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Sort By"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"asc",children:"Price: Low to High"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"desc",children:"Price: High to Low"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-list",children:products.map((p,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"http://localhost:5000".concat(p.image),alt:p.name,width:"100",onError:e=>e.target.src="https://via.placeholder.com/100"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:p.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u20B9",p.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:p.category})]},i))})]});}export default App;
